labInfo.title: SPACIOUS LAB UNIVERSE
labInfo.content: In Unicup bubble teashop, you are the professionalist of making tea drinks. We provide a tea illustration program for all tea lovers.You could create your special tea drinks with the best materails we provided.Our staffs are happpy to answer any questions of making dirnks, and offer helps and supports.

labInfo.title: UNIQUE TEA BASE
labInfo.content: We make our tea base with highly selective tea leaves from Tai Wan. Take a sip of our tea drink and you will experience each tea has its own determined aroma and taste.

labInfo.title: WE CARE YOUR NEEDS
labInfo.content: We are providing healthy tapioca which is made of various healthy nuts cereal powder. The tapioca is more healthy , tasty, and chewy! We provide various milk options include the lactose-free milk. All the milk is 100% organic.What you need in teadrink are taken care in Unicup
